lead_paragraph: Gov. Kate Brown of Oregon said she intended to bill the United States government for what the occupation of a national wildlife refuge by an armed group is costing state taxpayers.

headline.print_headline: Oregon: Governor Wants Restitution for Takeover
headline.main: Oregon: Governor Wants Restitution for Takeover

snippet: Gov. Kate Brown of Oregon said she intended to bill the United States government for what the occupation of a national wildlife refuge by an armed group is costing state taxpayers.
abstract: Oregon Gov Kate Brown expresses outrage at federal authorities' inaction dealing with continued armed occupation of Malheur National Wildlife Refuge by Ammon Bundy and his cohorts; Brown intends to bill US government for half-million dollars she says occupation has cost taxpayers.
